item.title: Pope Leo appeals for peace in Ukraine and in all war-torn regions - Vatican News
item.description: Pope Leo appeals for peace in Ukraine and in all war-torn regions Vatican NewsStarting Seven: January 22, 2026 The PillarCardinal Krajewski: We must concretely help suffering Ukrainians Vatican NewsCardinal says Ukrainian medal belongs to all Catholics, not him ucanews.comPope Leo Says Civilians in Ukraine Are Suffering, Calls for War to End U.S. News & World Report
